subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: PISCATAWAY, N.J., Sept. 7 (AP) — It took Ray Rice only two carries against Navy to become Rutgers’s career leading rusher.
snippet: PISCATAWAY, N.J., Sept. 7 (AP) — It took Ray Rice only two carries against Navy to become Rutgers’s career leading rusher.
